# {{ project_name }}

This project was generated using **Namel3ss (N3)** CRUD service template.

## Generated Files

This template includes:

- ✅ FastAPI REST API with OpenAPI docs
- ✅ PostgreSQL repository with asyncpg
- ✅ Pydantic models with validation
- ✅ Soft delete support
- ✅ Multi-tenancy ready
- ✅ 83 comprehensive tests
- ✅ Docker support
- ✅ Production-ready configuration
- ✅ N3 DSL integration

## Quick Start

```bash
# Install dependencies
make install-dev

# Set up database
make db-setup

# Configure environment
cp config/.env.example .env
# Edit .env with your DATABASE_URL

# Run tests
make test

# Start development server
make dev
```

Visit http://localhost:8000/docs for API documentation.

## Project Structure

```
.
├── app.n3              # N3 DSL configuration
├── main.py             # FastAPI application
├── config/             # Settings and environment
├── models/             # Domain models and schemas
├── repository/         # Data access layer
├── api/                # HTTP routes and dependencies
├── tests/              # Test suite (83 tests)
├── Dockerfile          # Production container
├── docker-compose.yml  # Local development stack
└── Makefile           # Common tasks
```

## Available Commands

Run `make help` to see all available commands.

Key commands:
- `make dev` - Start development server with auto-reload
- `make test` - Run all tests
- `make test-coverage` - Generate coverage report
- `make docker-build` - Build production Docker image
- `make db-reset` - Reset database to clean state

## Extending the Template

### Add Authentication

Edit `api/dependencies.py` and implement `get_current_user()`.

### Enable Multi-Tenancy

Set `ENABLE_MULTI_TENANCY=true` in `.env`.

### Add Custom Fields

1. Update `models/domain.py`
2. Update `models/schemas.py`
3. Update `migrations.sql`
4. Run `make db-migrate`

### Add New Endpoints

1. Add method to `repository/interface.py`
2. Implement in `repository/postgres.py`
3. Add route in `api/routes.py`

## Production Deployment

### Using Docker

```bash
# Build image
docker build -t {{ project_name | lower | replace('_', '-') }}:latest .

# Run container
docker run -p 8000:8000 --env-file .env {{ project_name | lower | replace('_', '-') }}:latest
```

### Using Docker Compose

```bash
docker-compose up -d
```

### Direct Deployment

```bash
# Install production dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run with Gunicorn
gunicorn main:app \
  --workers 4 \
  --worker-class uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker \
  --bind 0.0.0.0:8000
```

## Testing

```bash
# All tests
make test

# Unit tests only (fast, no DB)
make test-unit

# Integration tests (require DB)
make test-integration

# With coverage
make test-coverage
```
